title: Group Booking Inquiry
description: A corporate travel manager calls to inquire about booking a block of 20 rooms for a conference.

tasks.description: Gather the requirements: dates, number of rooms, and any meeting space needs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary details for the group inquiry.

tasks.description: Check room and meeting space availability for the requested dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms availability for the room block and a small conference room.

tasks.description: Generate a proposal with a discounted group rate and send it to the travel manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and sends a professional proposal.
